content: The category of (commutative) groups was still missing from our list of instances. This PR fills that gap. Nothing deep or serious.
@Johan Commelin, how about renaming AddCommGroup to Ab, per Reid's suggestion?
I don't really mind. But maybe we should think about naming conventions... all the other examples follow some sort of CamelCase version of the corresponding snake_version_of_the_type_class.
@Mario Carneiro @Reid Barton Any policies here, or opinions?
